title: Recruitment Process Update
passage:
Dear Mr. Thompson,

Thank you for applying for the Senior Software Developer position at NexaTech Solutions. We have reviewed your application and are -------(131.) to invite you for a first-round interview. 

The interview will be conducted via video conference on Thursday, October 12. During the session, you will be asked to demonstrate your -------(132.) in C++ and Python through a brief coding test. 

-------(133.). This will give us a better understanding of how you approach complex architecture designs. -------(134.), please send us a list of three professional references by the end of this week.

We look forward to speaking with you soon.

questions.explanation: be動詞の後の補語として、感情を表す過去分詞 (A) pleased が適切です。
コーディングテストを通じて「習熟度（proficiency）」を証明するという文脈が最適です。

options: We have already filled the position.
The test will last approximately 30 minutes.
The office is currently under construction.
questions.explanation: 直前の「コーディングテスト」についての詳細説明である (C) が最も自然な流れです。
面接の案内に加えて「推薦人のリスト送付」を追加で依頼しているため、(B) Additionally が正解です。
